     tests/empty_output_block.md fenced blocks
---------------------------------------------------
block     line  test        matching TEXT pattern
type    number  role        quoted and one per line
---------------------------------------------------
python      10  code
            16  del-output
python      22  code
            29  output
---------------------------------------------------
2 test cases.
1 code blocks missing an output block.
1 blocks marked "del-". They are not tested.
